definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4

definition: Olympic Organizing Committee/abbr. to 奧組委|奥组委
pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4 Zu3 zhi1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 奥林匹克运动会组织委员会

definition: National Games, Chinese athletics competition, organized every four years since 1959
National Intercity Games, Chinese athletics competition, organized every four years since 1988

sentences.english: Each Olympic Games, is the Greek festival of people .
sentences.chinese: 每一届奥林匹克运动会，都是全希腊人民的节日。

sentences.english: The president gave away prizes at the school sports.
sentences.chinese: 校长在学校运动会上颁发奖品。

sentences.english: Blessed are the balanced; they shall outlast everyone. One of the events in the summer Olympics is the pentathlon.
sentences.chinese: 夏季奥林匹克运动会中，有一个项目是五项全能运动。

sentences.english: Whether it rains or not, we’ll hold the sports meet.
sentences.chinese: 不管下不下雨，我们都将举行运动会。

sentences.english: There's less than two weeks to go until the start of the Shenzhen Universiade.
sentences.chinese: 距离深圳世界大学生运动会开始还有不到两周的时间。

sentences.english: Some sports or games go back thousands of years, like running or jumping.
sentences.chinese: 有些运动或运动会追溯到几千年，如跑步或跳跃。

sentences.english: I’m fortunate because this will be my fourth time participating in the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 我很幸运，因为这将是我第四次参加奥林匹克运动会。

sentences.english: The first prize was awarded to the best competitor of the annual sports meeting .
sentences.chinese: 头奖颁给了这一年一度的运动会上最优秀的运动员。

sentences.english: Pistorius will take part in the upcoming Beijing Paralympics.
sentences.chinese: 皮斯托利斯将参加即将举行的北京残障运动会。

sentences.english: We cannot calculate upon having fine weather for the sports meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能指望着开运动会时会有个好天气。

sentences.english: But make no mistake; Gasol and Bryant are totally geeked about the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 了，加索尔和科比在奥林匹克运动会上完全没经验。
英联邦运动会就是主要的例子。

sentences.english: He created a new record in hellogh-jump at our school sports.
sentences.chinese: 在咱们黉舍的运动会上，他创造了跳高新纪录。

sentences.english: The unscrupulous governor attempted to sabotage the Roon Colonial Games.
sentences.chinese: 这位不择手段的总督企图破坏鲁恩殖民地运动会。

sentences.english: A number of records fell during the sports meet.
sentences.chinese: 在运动会上破了多项记录。

sentences.english: We are volunteers for Shenzhen th Summer Universiade.
sentences.chinese: 我们是深圳第届夏季大学生运动会的志愿者。

definition: setting-up exercises during the break (between classes)
